testcase.classname: As an administrator, I should be able to access all registered user information via API connection.
testcase.name: When a GET request is sent to the /api/get-users endpoint with valid authorization credentials, the expected status code
testcase.system-out: * The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token...............passed * The api user sets "api/get-users" path parameters.........................passed * The API user sends a GET request and records the response ................passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 200.........................passed * The api user verifies that the message information in the response body is "success".passed
